fields.descricao_curta_pt: Site profissional completo com design responsivo e SEO otimizado

fields.descricao_en: Development of modern, responsive institutional websites, ideal for showcasing your company, services, and competitive advantages with a professional online presence.

beneficios_pt: Até 5 páginas (Home, Sobre, Serviços, Contato, Blog)
